analyzed: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi med do //
translated: The formless realm has twenty-four, excluding the four of the base of infinite space.

original: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang sngar bshad pa brgyad do //
analyzed: 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang sngar bshad pa brgyad do //
translated: The summit of existence has eight, which are concomitant with the aspects of subsequent knowledge of the truth of cessation, as previously explained.

original: de dag na grangs bzhin du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / nyi shu bzhi dang / nyi shu yod do //
analyzed: de dag na grangs bzhin du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / nyi shu bzhi dang / nyi shu yod do //
translated: In those three realms, there are, respectively, twenty-eight, twenty-four, and twenty.

original: ji ltar byas pas nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas pas nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod ce na /
translated: How is it that there are twenty-eight?

original: rdo rje lta bu lnga bcu rtsa gnyis las 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang / 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa bcu drug dor bas nyi shu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu lnga bcu rtsa gnyis las 'gog pa dang lam la chos shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang / 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa bcu drug dor bas nyi shu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: From the fifty-two vajra like concentrations, eight are concomitant with the aspects of Dharma knowledge of the truths of cessation and path and sixteen focus on the cessation of the fourth absorption that are concomitant with the aspects of subsequent knowledge of the truth of cessation.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyis bsdus pa srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas @189a * //üîΩskye mched la sogs pa'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bcu drug dang / lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyis bsdus pa srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la dmigs pa sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa brgyad dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas @189a * // skye mched la sogs pa'i 'gog pa la dmigs pa 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bcu drug dang / lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi ste /
translated: Eight are concomitant with the aspects of subsequent knowledge of the truths of suffering and origin that focus on the suffering and origin of the summit of existence subsumed by the base of infinite space.

original: rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i zad par la dmigs pa'i phyir ro ;üîΩ/ de'i phyir de ltar na /
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i zad par la dmigs pa'i phyir ro ; / de'i phyir de ltar na /
translated: Sixteen are concomitant with the aspects of subsequent knowledge of cessation that focus on the cessation of the base of infinite space and so on and four are concomitant with the aspects of subsequent knowledge of the path.üîΩThey are called the summit of existence because they are the summit of existence.

original: shes pa'i rnam pa dang / dmigs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir nyi shu rtsa brgyad yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa dang / dmigs pa'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir nyi shu rtsa brgyad yin no //
translated: Therefore, because they are differentiated by the aspects and focal objects of knowledge, they are eighteen.

original: de bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyis bsdus pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'gog pa la dmigs pa bla lhag du dor nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyis bsdus pa ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'gog pa la dmigs pa bla lhag du dor nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi yin no //
translated: Similarly, the sphere of infinite consciousness includes twenty-four, since it discards the sphere of infinite space, which is superior to the object field of the cessation of the sphere of infinite consciousness.

original: de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'gog pa la dmigs pa yang bor nas nyi shu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis bsdus pa ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi 'gog pa la dmigs pa yang bor nas nyi shu yin no //
translated: Similarly, the sphere of nothingness includes twenty, since it discards the sphere of infinite consciousness, which is the object field of the cessation of the sphere of nothingness.

original: yang ci'i phyir sa gzhan gyi 'gog pa kho na la dmigs kyi /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir sa gzhan gyi 'gog pa kho na la dmigs kyi /
translated: Why do they focus on the cessation of other levels alone?

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba ltar sa gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la ma yin zhe na ;
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba ltar sa gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba la ma yin zhe na ;
translated: They do not focus on the origin and suffering of other levels, as they do with the summit of existence.

original: sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because they are free from attachment to lower levels.

original: de'i srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa brgyad ni lus so //
analyzed: de'i srid pa'i rtse mo'i rnam pa brgyad ni lus so //
translated: The eight aspects of the summit of existence are the body.

original: yang ci'i phyir rang gi sa dang sa gong ma pa kho na'i 'gog pa la dmigs kyi bsam gtan bzhin du sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rang gi sa dang sa gong ma pa kho na'i 'gog pa la dmigs kyi bsam gtan bzhin du sa 'og ma pa ni ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why do they focus on the cessation of their own level and higher levels, but not on lower levels like the absorptions?

original: sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la ma dmigs par de'i 'gog pa la dmigs par mi nus so //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i sdug bsngal la ma dmigs par de'i 'gog pa la dmigs par mi nus so //
translated: One cannot focus on the cessation of lower level suffering without focusing on lower level suffering.

original: sdug bsngal yang thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa yin la /
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang thams cad zag pa dang bcas pa yin la /
translated: Also, all suffering is contaminated.

original: gzugs med dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi //
analyzed: gzugs med dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi //
translated: The formless actual basis

original: spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min //
analyzed: spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min //
translated: is not the contaminated lower level.üîΩThis is ascertained.

original: zhes bya ba 'di yang nges pas 'di ni rgyu yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di yang nges pas 'di ni rgyu yin no //
translated: This is the reason.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi kun du blta ba'i phyir mi dgag ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi kun du blta ba'i phyir mi dgag ste /
translated: The absorptions are not blocked because they are the all-seeing.

original: bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu yin //
analyzed: bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu yin //
translated: The absorptions are virtuous and all objects exist.

original: zhes bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This will be explained.

original: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There is focusing on the antidote of lower levels.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: This is the vajra like concentration.

original: gnyen po de ni phan tshun du rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyen po de ni phan tshun du rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because those antidotes are mutually causal.

original: 'dis ni bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa'i yongs su shes pa thams cad sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs par bstan te /
analyzed: 'dis ni bsam gtan gyis bsdus pa'i yongs su shes pa thams cad sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs par bstan te /
translated: This indicates that all perfect knowledges subsumed by the absorptions focus on the antidote of lower levels.

original: gang zhig nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pas bsdus pa de ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pas bsdus pa de ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa nyid do //
translated: Those perfect knowledges subsumed by the base of infinite space and so on focus on the antidote of their own level and higher levels.

original: gang dag lam la rjes su shes pa yang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ltar sa re re'i gnyen po la dmigs pa @189b yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad kyi sa'i gnyen po la dmigs pa dag las
analyzed: gang dag lam la rjes su shes pa yang 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa ltar sa re re'i gnyen po la dmigs pa @189b yin par 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad kyi sa'i gnyen po la dmigs pa dag las
translated: Those who assert that subsequent knowledge of the truth of path focuses on the antidote of each level, just as subsequent knowledge of the truth of cessation does, would have twenty eight perfect knowledges.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po la dmigs pa bzhi tshan gcig bor nas nyi shu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur te /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i gnyen po la dmigs pa bzhi tshan gcig bor nas nyi shu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur te /
translated: They would eliminate one set of four perfect knowledges that focus on the antidote of the summit of existence.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa bsam gtan dang po'i gnyen po la dmigs pa /
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pas bsdus pa bsam gtan dang po'i gnyen po la dmigs pa /
translated: The perfect knowledge subsumed by unrestricted access concentration focuses on the antidote of the first absorption.

original: lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi gnyen po la dmigs pa lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bar du bzhi ste /
analyzed: lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi gnyen po la dmigs pa lam la rjes su shes pa'i rnam pa dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bar du bzhi ste /
translated: Four are associated with the aspects of subsequent knowledge of the truth of path, since they focus on the antidote to the base of nothingness.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis la nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag bsnan pas da ltar na brgyad cur 'gyur ro //üîΩbsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa dag kyang re re zhing brgyad cu yin no //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis la nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag bsnan pas da ltar na brgyad cur 'gyur ro // bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pas bsdus pa dag kyang re re zhing brgyad cu yin no //
translated: Thus, by adding those twenty-eight to the fifty-two, there are eighty.üîΩThe same applies to those subsumed by the fourth absorption.üîΩThose subsumed by the special first, second, third and fourth absorptions are also eighty each.

original: go rims bzhin du bzhi bcu dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du bzhi bcu dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Forty, thirty-two, twenty-four and twenty-eight, respectively.

original: ji ltar byas pas she na /
analyzed: ji ltar byas pas she na /
translated: How is this?

original: rdo rje lta bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad la bcu gnyis bsnan na bzhi bcur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad la bcu gnyis bsnan na bzhi bcur 'gyur ro //
translated: By adding twelve to the eighteen vajra like concentrations, there are forty.

original: de bzhin du sngar bshad pa dag la brgyad dang bzhis bsnan na sum cu rtsa gnyis dang nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro //üîΩyang ci'i phyir gzugs med pa dag rang dang gong ma'i sa pa'i gnyen po kho na la dmigs par bshad kyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du sngar bshad pa dag la brgyad dang bzhis bsnan na sum cu rtsa gnyis dang nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro // yang ci'i phyir gzugs med pa dag rang dang gong ma'i sa pa'i gnyen po kho na la dmigs par bshad kyi /
translated: So too, if you add eight and four to the former explanations, there are thirty two and twenty four.

original: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are formless states explained as focusing on the antidote of their own level and higher levels alone, but not on the antidote of lower levels?

original: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes la sogs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar gsungs pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes la sogs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar gsungs pa'i phyir la /
translated: Because it is said that they completely transcend the discernment of form and so on.

original: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po'i sgo nas ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po'i sgo nas ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because they focus on the object field of the antidote of lower levels, they are antidotes to the discordant classes of lower levels.

original: 'o na sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de /
analyzed: 'o na sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa ni yod de /
translated: But if that is so, then it is said that they focus on the antidote of lower levels,

original: de ni phan tshun rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ni phan tshun rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: because they are mutually concomitant causes.

original: de ni khyad par du ma byas par rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam sa dgu ba ni sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin no zhes bshad kyi /
analyzed: de ni khyad par du ma byas par rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam sa dgu ba ni sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin no zhes bshad kyi /
translated: The path compatible with subsequent knowledge that does not specifically focus on the summit of existence focuses on the antidote to the lower level.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pas bsdus pa sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs so zhes khyad par du byas nas ni ma bstan pas sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pas bsdus pa sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs so zhes khyad par du byas nas ni ma bstan pas sa 'og ma'i gnyen po la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshul 'di ni /
translated: This is explained in general, but it is not taught that it focuses on the antidote to the lower level in a specific way, such as by focusing on the antidote to the base of infinite space and so on.

original: bsam gtan gyi sa pa dag kho na la yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi sa pa dag kho na la yin no //
translated: Therefore this method of focusing on the antidote to the lower level is a method of the absorptions alone.

original: yang rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis ni ches mang ba yin no @190a * //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis ni ches mang ba yin no @190a * // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Moreover, it is far more numerous due to the specific types and faculties.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it more numerous?

original: re zhig mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rdo rje lta bu gang yin pa de ni rigs kyi bye brag gis khyad par rnam pa drug yin la /
analyzed: re zhig mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rdo rje lta bu gang yin pa de ni rigs kyi bye brag gis khyad par rnam pa drug yin la /
translated: The vajra like concentration concomitant with the aspect of impermanence is distinguished by the specific type in six ways.

original: dbang po rtul po dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yin te /
analyzed: dbang po rtul po dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yin te /
translated: They are three types due to the specific distinctions of dull, medium, and sharp intellectual faculty.

original: sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra bar rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis khyad par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra bar rigs dang dbang po'i bye brag gis khyad par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Other states concomitant with the aspects of suffering and so on should be differentiated by type and intellectual faculty in the same way.

original: zad pa shes pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zad pa shes pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is knowledge of elimination.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because it arises simultaneously with the obtainment of the elimination of all contaminants.

original: dper na dang por yod pa ni dang po yin no zhes bya ba ltar thog mar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dper na dang por yod pa ni dang po yin no zhes bya ba ltar thog mar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as it is said, ‚ÄúThat which exists first is primary,‚Äù it is the first.

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: This is stated:

original: zad pa shes pa ni dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i shes pa'o zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: zad pa shes pa ni dang po nyid du zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i shes pa'o zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: Knowledge of elimination is the first knowledge that arises simultaneously with the obtainment of the elimination of all contaminants.

original: bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pas rdo rje'i sor gdub bzhin no //
analyzed: bar gyi tshig mi mngon par byas pas rdo rje'i sor gdub bzhin no //
translated: The middle word is elided, like a vajra ring.

original: rnam par grol ba'i shes pa gzhan yang zad pa'i thob pa dang / lhan cig skye mod kyi zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba ma yin pa de dag zad pa shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i shes pa gzhan yang zad pa'i thob pa dang / lhan cig skye mod kyi zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba ma yin pa de dag zad pa shes pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, the cognition of liberation arises simultaneously with the obtainment of the elimination of contaminants, but it is not the cognition of elimination that arises simultaneously with the obtainment of the elimination of all contaminants.

original: mi skye ba shes pa ni zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye mod kyi /
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pa ni zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye mod kyi /
translated: The cognition of nonarising arises simultaneously with the obtainment of the elimination of all contaminants,

original: de ni dang po nyid du ma yin pas de zad pa shes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni dang po nyid du ma yin pas de zad pa shes pa ma yin no //
translated: but it is not the cognition of elimination because it does not arise first.

original: gang gi tshe slob pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'di'i zag pa kha cig spangs pa yin na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe slob pa'i gnas skabs na yang 'di'i zag pa kha cig spangs pa yin na /
translated: If some contaminants are eliminated in the state of being a learner,

original: de'i phyir zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ci ste brjod ce na /
analyzed: de'i phyir zag pa thams cad zad pa'i thob pa dang lhan cig skye ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ci ste brjod ce na /
translated: why is it said that it is the cognition of elimination because it arises simultaneously with the obtainment of the elimination of all contaminants?

original: spangs pa bden mod kyi /
analyzed: spangs pa bden mod kyi /
translated: It is true that they are eliminated.

original: 'on kyang sngar spangs pa rnams kyi bral ba'i thob pa dag yang skye ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang sngar spangs pa rnams kyi bral ba'i thob pa dag yang skye ste /
translated: However, the obtainment of freedom from those previously eliminated arises again.

original: 'bras las sngon lam btang ba dang// gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang // zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras las sngon lam btang ba dang// gzhan thob pa dang zad bsdoms dang // zhes bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and one who upgrades his intellectual faculty from the result of arhat.

original: 'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir bslab par bya ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'bras bu gzhan gyi phyir bslab par bya ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because there is no training for another result.

original: gal te mi slob pa la yang dbang po 'pho ba'i sgo nas 'bras bu gzhan thob par bya ba'i phyir yod de /
analyzed: gal te mi slob pa la yang dbang po 'pho ba'i sgo nas 'bras bu gzhan thob par bya ba'i phyir yod de /
translated: If one who is a nonlearner upgrades his intellectual faculty, he obtains another result.

original: spel bas 'bras bu khyad par can zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: spel bas 'bras bu khyad par can zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúOne who upgrades his intellectual faculty obtains a distinctive result.‚Äù

original: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not so, because

original: de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba de bzhin du de'i 'bras bu gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba de bzhin du de'i 'bras bu gzhan ma yin no //
translated: his result is not another result, just as the result of once return and nonreturn are not other results.

original: gang du sngar gyi 'bras bu rgyu mtshan can gyi ming dor nas 'bras bu phyi ma'i rgyu mtshan can gyi ming btags pa de ni de'i 'bras bu gzhan yin no zhes bya bar shes na dgra bcom @190b pa de ltar dbang po 'phos kyang sngar gyi ming mi
analyzed: gang du sngar gyi 'bras bu rgyu mtshan can gyi ming dor nas 'bras bu phyi ma'i rgyu mtshan can gyi ming btags pa de ni de'i 'bras bu gzhan yin no zhes bya bar shes na dgra bcom @190b pa de ltar dbang po 'phos kyang sngar gyi ming mi
translated: If it is known that when one discards the former name of a result that is a reason for the name of a former result and is designated with the name of a later result that is a reason for the name of a later result, that is another result, then an arhat who upgrades his intellectual faculty would not be called an arhat.

original: 'dor la / de'i dbang po 'phos kyang snga ma ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yin pas 'bras bu gzhan thob pa med do //
analyzed: 'dor la / de'i dbang po 'phos kyang snga ma ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yin pas 'bras bu gzhan thob pa med do //
translated: Even though his faculties have changed, he is still an arhat as before, and he does not obtain another result.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because of that,

original: gang gi phyir de ni rang gi don yongs su rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni rang gi don yongs su rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir te /

original: rang gi don yongs su sogs pa ni shin tu ches gzhan gyi don byed par 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi don yongs su sogs pa ni shin tu ches gzhan gyi don byed par 'os pa yin no //

original: 'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /

original: 'dod chags dang bcas pa ni so so'i skye bo dang slob pa dag go //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bcas pa ni so so'i skye bo dang slob pa dag go //

original: gang zag zad pa shes pa ma skyes par gyur ba'i gang zag de dag ni slob pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gang zag zad pa shes pa ma skyes par gyur ba'i gang zag de dag ni slob pa zhes bya ste /

original: de nyid kyi phyir gang zag sngar bshad pa bdun ni slob pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub bo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gang zag sngar bshad pa bdun ni slob pa dag yin no zhes bya bar grub bo zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: de dag ni zhugs pa bzhi dang 'bras bu la gnas pa gsum mo //

analyzed: rgyu gang gis gang zag bdun po de dag slob pa yin par brjod ce na /

original: de'i phyir zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa'i ngang tshul can yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir slob pa'i ngang tshul can yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says: because they are inclined to train in order to eliminate the contaminants.

original: gang la zhe na /
analyzed: gang la zhe na /

original: bslab pa gsum po la'o //
analyzed: bslab pa gsum po la'o //
translated: The three trainings.üîΩThey are inclined to superior morality,

original: de dag gi lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: de dag gi lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: etc.

original: tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi dbang du byas pa'i bslab pa ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims so //

original: lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bar yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bar yang de dang 'dra'o //

original: de dag ni rang bzhin ci zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ni rang bzhin ci zhe na /

original: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi rang bzhin dag yin no zhes bya ba smos so //

analyzed: so so'i skye bo yang slob pa yin par 'gyur te /

original: de yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab la slob pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab la slob pa yin no zhe na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: bden pa yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du ma shes pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bden pa yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du ma shes pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because one does not know the truths as they are in reality.

analyzed: so so'i skye bo zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //

analyzed: 'di ltar lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the higher training in virtue and the higher training in the mind,

analyzed: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: what is the higher training in wisdom?

analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yin no zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes shing zhes bya ba nas /
translated: It is the correct knowledge that ‚ÄúThis is the noble truth of suffering,‚Äù and so on up to

original: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yin no zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yin no zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs te /
translated: ‚ÄúThis is the noble truth of the path that leads to the cessation of suffering.‚Äù

original: so so'i skye bo la ni yongs su shes pa zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo la ni yongs su shes pa zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Ordinary beings do not have the uncontaminated complete knowledge that is the correct knowledge of reality,

original: de med pas de @191a * //
analyzed: de med pas de @191a * //
translated: and because they do not have that, they do not have

original: la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin yang med do //
analyzed: la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin yang med do //
translated: There is no morality and no concentration that is uncontaminated.

original: de'i phyir bslab pa rnams zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir bslab pa rnams zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the trainings are uncontaminated,

original: de bslab pa dag la slob pa ma yin no //üîΩyang bslab pa gtong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la re zhig lhag pa'i tshul khrims la bslab pa gtong ste /
analyzed: de bslab pa dag la slob pa ma yin no // yang bslab pa gtong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la re zhig lhag pa'i tshul khrims la bslab pa gtong ste /
translated: he is not training in the trainings.üîΩMoreover, he relinquishes the trainings.

original: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtong ba'i phyir ro //üîΩlhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa la yang bslab pa gtong ste /
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtong ba'i phyir ro // lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa la yang bslab pa gtong ste /

original: bsam gtan las yongs su nyams pa las so //
analyzed: bsam gtan las yongs su nyams pa las so //

original: gzhan dag na re dro bar gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa las yongs su nyams pa las so zhe'o //üîΩlhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la yang slob pa gtong ste /

original: sdom pa'i yan lag gis shes rab nas dro bar gyur pas bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi bar las yongs su nyams pa las so //
analyzed: sdom pa'i yan lag gis shes rab nas dro bar gyur pas bsdus pa'i shes rab kyi bar las yongs su nyams pa las so //
translated: He relinquishes the training in superior wisdom because he degenerates from the wisdom that is a branch of the vows up to the wisdom that is included in heat.

original: dgra bcom pa dang slob pa yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa dang slob pa yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it also the case that arhats and learners can retrogress?

original: yongs su nyams mod kyi yongs su nyams pas 'chi ba'am /
analyzed: yongs su nyams mod kyi yongs su nyams pas 'chi ba'am /
translated: They can retrogress, but they do not die in a state of retrogressing.

original: des bya ba ma yin pa byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des bya ba ma yin pa byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Nor do they commit transgressions that are unallowable.

original: slob pa yongs su nyams pa la yang bslab pa gsum po lhag pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i shes rab yod de /
analyzed: slob pa yongs su nyams pa la yang bslab pa gsum po lhag pa lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang / lhag pa'i shes rab yod de /
translated: Learners who have retrograded still have the three trainings: superior morality, superior mind, and superior wisdom.

original: de la 'bras bu dang po la nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'bras bu dang po la nyams pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, in the first stage of the fruit, there is no retrogressing.

original: so so'i skye bo ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su chad pa la bslab pa gsum po rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su chad pa la bslab pa gsum po rnam pa thams cad du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But ordinary beings who have severed their wholesome roots do not have the three trainings in any form.

original: 'phags pa rang bzhin du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'phags pa rang bzhin du gnas pa zhes bya ba ni lung du ma bstan pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúNoble ones who are abiding in their own nature‚Äù means those who are abiding in a neutral life-style.

original: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs la brjod do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs la brjod do //
translated: The nature of sentient beings is described as being in a non-concentrated state.

original: bsam pa ni bsam mo //
analyzed: bsam pa ni bsam mo //
translated: The intention is the thought.

original: lam du 'gro ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba'i bsam pa ma btang ba'i phyir lam du zhugs pa zas la sogs pa za zhing /
analyzed: lam du 'gro ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba'i bsam pa ma btang ba'i phyir lam du zhugs pa zas la sogs pa za zhing /

original: mi 'gro yang lam du 'gro ba zhes brjod pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mi 'gro yang lam du 'gro ba zhes brjod pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: Just as one who has set out on a road is said to be traveling on a road even when he is eating food and is not moving, because he has not given up the intention to travel.

original: thob ba dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: thob ba dang rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because it is connected with the obtainment of the learner.

original: rang bzhin du gnas kyang bslab pa gsum gyi thob pa dang rjes su 'brel pas slob pa nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas kyang bslab pa gsum gyi thob pa dang rjes su 'brel pas slob pa nyid du brjod do //
translated: Even though he is abiding in his natural state, he is said to be a learner because he is connected with the obtainment of the three trainings.üîΩThe four types of persons who are learners and nonlearners are mentioned in the sutra:

original: slob pa dang mi slob pa'i gang zag bzhi la yang slob pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: slob pa dang mi slob pa'i gang zag bzhi la yang slob pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: What are the dharmas of the learner?

original: slob pa zag pa med pa rnams so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: slob pa zag pa med pa rnams so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The uncontaminated dharmas of the learner.

original: mi slob pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mi slob pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The dharmas of the nonlearner are similar.

original: ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa slob pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa slob pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is nirvana not a learner?

original: gang zhig slob pa kho na ldan pa de ni @191b slob pa'i chos zhes bya na /
analyzed: gang zhig slob pa kho na ldan pa de ni @191b slob pa'i chos zhes bya na /
translated: That which is possessed only by the learner is called a dharma of the learner.

analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga la yang yod de /

analyzed: so so'i skye bo rnams la ni 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis mya ngan las 'das pa dag skye la /

analyzed: 'phags pa rnams ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis skye'o //

analyzed: mi slob pa dang skye so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'byung ngo //

analyzed: slob pa dang so so'i skye bo gnyi ga yang de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'dis ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa yang slob pa dang mi slob pa nyid yin pa bsal ba yin no //

analyzed: zhugs pa dang po dang 'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi'o zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: zhugs pa dang po ni mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir 'bras bu las tha dad pa yin no //

analyzed: 'bras bu la gnas pa gsum las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: ji lta zhe na /

analyzed: de ltar na 'bras bu la zhugs pa rnams ni 'bras bu la gnas pa gsum las tha mi dad do //

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag kyang ma yin no //
